text: Science and Star Wars is a series of videos created by Disney and posted online for educational purposes. The series was published in 2017 and is available to view on YouTube. It focuses on the science and technology of the Star Wars world and analyses them from a scientific perspective. The show is hosted by Anthony Carboni. ==References== ==Other websites== *Science and Star Wars on YouTube *Official site Category:Star Wars Category:Science
title: Science and Star Wars
